pages.text: In the early game, you can make a $(thing)thatch bed$(). $(br2)Although it cannot be used to set a respawn point, it can at least be used to skip the night. $(br2)To build a thatch bed, place two adjacent $(thing)thatch blocks$() on the ground, then right-click the thatch blocks while holding a $(thing)large animal hide$(). Only large animals drop large hides, such as $(thing)bears$() and $(thing)cows$().

$(br2)You can also craft a $(thing)bed$() using planks and hay bales. $(br2)Remember! You can only sleep when you are tired. If you have already slept multiple times in a row, you won't be able to sleep again, even if it's nighttime. $(br2)You can also $(thing)dye$() the bed.
